MODIFICATION HISTORY


Logitech Gaming LED SDK

  1.01.001 - June 2012
    Initial full featured SDK.

  1.01.002 - June 2012
    Simplified header by using .def file instead of dllexport.

  1.01.003/4 - July 2012
    Fixed an issue with saving and restoring lighting on G15s. A few other minor fixes (documentation, statically linked sample program).

  1.01.005 - September 2012
    Replaced bool with BOOL return values for compatibility with a gaming engine.

  1.01.005.1
    Exact same as 1.01.005, with addition of documentation for UDK developers.
